title: Why does WILM (the CBS affiliate) superimpose its logo on the screen all the time rather than just during required station identification times?
text:
Basically, television stations use these on-screen graphics to
identify the origin of the signal and to identify the origin of the
signal when programming is recorded on a digital recorder.

Here's a link some more information from about.com:



http://www.answers.com/topic/digital-on-screen-graphic-1
